title: Sandra99
author: Sandra99
content: Tell me about doradus.io website I say they are paying  3.12% daily is It True or Legit or scam?doradus like a 8bit.ltd ?

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: The website in question has been created only 100 days ago and like any other ponzi scheme, they are surely scammers. Do not waste your money and avoid any get-rich-quick scheme. No one will give you free money. Quote from: domaintoolsDates   100 days oldCreated on 2022-11-04Expires on 2024-11-04Updated on 2022-12-19

comments.author: Zwei
comments.body: You should ask yourself if anyone has a magic formula that pays 3.12% daily, why would he need your money or others money?If they start with only $100, they would have $7191462 in just one year. Don't let greed cloud your judgement and end up being scammed.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 12, 2023, 06:56:57 PMI say they are paying  3.12% daily They say that they are paying 3.12% daily, but they are not paying out nothing so if you sent any money to them, you can forget about ever seeing them again. Rule of thumb: any website that offers you more than few % yearly profit is a straight up scam. You should generally avoid all staking platforms as not your keys, not your coins.Quote from: Sandra99 on February 12, 2023, 06:56:57 PMdoradus like a 8bit.ltd ?8bit is even a more obvious scam. Selling ETH with a 30% discount lol.
